snippet.title: Sigils of Nightfall - Official Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Sigils of Nightfall is a roguelike deckbuilder that combines dungeon crawling with elements of the award-winning RPG, Mörk Borg. Embark on a dark journey, improve your character, and survive at all costs — or be consumed by the horrors lurking in the darkness.

The seal has broken. Defenses have fallen. Chaos is unleashed. The entity awakens, hungering for blood. Will you hide in the shadows, or embrace the dark powers to survive?

Wishlist Sigils of Nightfall on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/3039980/Sigils_of_Nightfall

-----

SIGILS OF NIGHTFALL is an independent production by TWO WEDGES and MONUMENTAL Collab, and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.
MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
